Name: Rime Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Module (Active)

Charge Window Level: -50%
Heat Generation: -30%
Signature Size: +30%
Duration: Instant (with 30 second debuff)
Uses: 5

Reduce the chance of a catastrophic explosion by using the Rime mining module to dissipate heat and improve a deposit's stability.
